author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Crypto heist hacker returns most of the stolen funds
description: In notes sent to the blockchain, the hacker claimed to be offered a reward for returning the assets.
content:
By Joe TidyCyber security reporter, BBC News
A hacker who stole just over $600m (£433m) worth of cryptocurrency has now returned most of the stolen assets.
On Thursday, Poly Network confirmed on Tw… [+4106 chars]
